title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.01 - City of Dunkirk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.01 - City of Dunkirk

State Regulations
(a) Route 60. Route 60 (Lamphere Street, Maple Avenue and Main Street) between the Town of

Dunkirk - City of Dunkirk line and Route 5. (b) [Eff. until Dec. 4, 1991, see also subd. (b) below.] Route 5. Route 5 between Middle Road and West Point

Avenue. (b) [Eff. Dec. 4, 1991
until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (b) above and below.] Route 5. Route 5
between Stegelske Avenue and West Point Avenue. (b) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (b)
above.] [Repealed]
(c) Nichols

Avenue. The northbound and southbound roadways of Nichols Avenue, between Route
5 and the terminus of Nichols Avenue; provided, however, that Nichols Avenue is
designated as an access highway for use by tandem trailer combinations 102
inches in width, and is not hereby designated as an access highway for any
other types of vehicles. (d) West

Point Avenue. West Point Avenue between Route 5 and the terminus of West Point

Avenue. (e) Stegelske Avenue. Stegelske Avenue between Route 5 and a point 900 feet south of Route
5. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8106.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
